param.name: wait_for
param.label: Run this only after the following dataset is ready
param.help: Use this if you want to delay the job execution until some data is already loaded. The selected dataset will not be used for anything else.

param.name: rel_subject_re
param.label: Regular expression to extract the unique name of the parent feature
param.help: this regex will be applied on the fasta definition line to generate the unique name of the parent feature

param.name: rel_subject_type
param.label: Sequence type of the parent
param.help: this should be a Sequence Ontology term
